ComicInfo.Summary:
Ship of the Damned: Conan is sailing the seas with his beloved Bêlit, pirate queen of the Black Coast. They come across a haunted ship with animated wooden statues, and Conan sees a glimpse of his future.
Requiem: A wounded Conan is nursed back to health by peaceful villagers and decides to repay their kindness by hunting for them. He returns to find that the villagers have all been killed by the same raiders that wounded him in the first place. Conan kills the raiders.
Die by the Sword: Conan is a mercenary in the Turanian army, fighting Hyrkanian nomads. He kills a fierce female warrior in battle and then comforts her dying daughter.
In the City of Thieves: Young Conan is thieving in Arenjun and turns down an offer to act as bodyguard to two students of magic. As it turns out, his instincts prove him right. The students are killed by a conjured demon, and since they are already dead, Conan steals their belongings.
Aftermath -- and a Beginning: Young Conan wanders from his baptism of fire, the Battle of Venarium, into Aesgaard, where he joins the Aesir in their fight against the Vanir raiders.
